flawed_nl_solution:
Marge had 23 - 5 = <<23-5=18>>18 seeds grow into plants.
Rabbits ate 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 plants.
There were 18 - 6 = <<18-6=9>>9 plants left.
Weeds strangled 9 / 3 = <<9/3=3>>3 plants.
She had 9 - 3 = <<9-3=6>>6 plants left.
Marge kept 1 weed, so she ended up with 6 + 1 = <<6+1=7>>7 plants.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
